% if c.success: ${_('The message id: %(id)s has been released') % dict(id=c.id)} % else: ${_('The message id: %(id)s could not be released: %(error_msg)s, contact your email admin for assistance.') % dict(id=c.id, error_msg=c.error_msg if hasattr(c, 'error_msg') else 'backend error occured')} % endif
